channel.title: [REQ] Noclip command
channel.description: Hey, i have the noclip command on my server but it doesn't work, it just disconnects you. If someone could help, add me on msn (Splideo@hotmail.co.uk) i'll send you my client.java file, then i'll let you edit the file. If you don't want to do that, i would be more than happy for you to tell me how to do it here.

item.title: [REQ] Noclip command
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

On your server, if you do ::noclip it disconnects, search for it in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Noclip command
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

superbum1:

maybe ur server…doesnt let u noclip cuz noclip can ruin ur server file and ur player file…noclipping shouldent be used anyways if u let people noclip they can turn invisible fairly quick on ur server

Lol, it doesn’t do any such thing. Noclipping is client side - The only reason there is a “noclip” command listed in client.java is so that the server can actually recognize it when a player uses it in their client… That way the server can carry out the necessary actions (eg, my server warns the player and kicks them… After they noclip three times, they get banned). Just remove the command completely from client.java - You don’t need it if you don’t want players to be kicked when they noclip.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Noclip command
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

ZIf you do ::noclip and it disconnects you it meas you are not admin. To change it so it doesn’t d/c you just go into the client.java file and find the noclip command and under it will be something about d/cing you if playerrights <= 1

Read full topic
